name: Space savior
description:
This game was originally made for jamDNA 14 

Controls: Use the left and right arrows to move 

                      You can dash left and right using C and V however don't count on that too 

                      much as once you use it it will need to reload listen for a small ting to 

                      indicate it's ready

                      Use Space to shoot

                      Your goal is to get as high of a score as possible

                      the red is the simple one the green turns to red when shot as you break it's 

                      green armor and the yellow is a bomber avoid him at all cost

Criteria #1 :Retro, really you can't get more retro than a simple space shooter and the sprites were made in 8 bit then scaled up to their size

Criteria #2 :Laser beam, it's a shooter, a laser shooter :D

Criteria #3 ;Dash, as I mentioned you can dash right and left by using either C or V

Criteria #4:Arpeggio, the main (only ahm ahm) song is considered an arpeggio

Credits: the only thing not created by me are the sound effects used from the game maker pro 8 free assets that used to come with the program everything else was created by yours truly and within the jam's duration.

thank you for reading
